column3: Traffic;Prey Veng:------ At 9:30 am on November 23
column5: there was a traffic accident on National Road 1 between a motorbike and bus travelling in the same direction in Stoeng Sdul village
column10: was driven by 46-year-old Tran Bach Thao
column14: was turning into a gasoline station when it hit a 22-year-old male on a motorcycle. The injured man was taken to hospital immediately.------Both vehicles were taken at Neak Loeung Administration Station.
